entry.title: Momma Stiles to the Fucking Rescue you Bunch of FailWolfs
entry.summary:
Author: Estra4

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,712Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 166

Summary: Stiles needed a break from Scott and his Allison hat (get it because he has his head so far up her ass... you know what, never mind, I know I’m funny).After the absolute shit show that was the warehouses everything, Stiles was ready to sleep. Unfortunately, that sleep was being impeded by the infestation that was the Hale Pack. From would be runaways sneaking into his house at all hours to trauma bond, to a not so dead Creeperwolf, an angst ridden previous lizard person, and newly borne banshee in the body of pre-existing queen bee, not to mention the newly christened curly haired pup and the raging eyebrowed Alpha; it was a wonder Stiles would ever get a break for the rest of summer.Though an Alpha pack turning up at the same time as wolf twins was purely a coincident – Stiles is sure, and the less said about human sacrifices the safer for his sanity.Stiles is starting to think he jinked himself when he said nothing ever happened in this town. Too fucking much was happening and Stiles would like a refund, thank you, because clearly his stereotypical small town was broken.

entry.title: Secret
entry.summary:
Author: Ann_shawol24

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,311Chapters: 42/61Kudos: 91

Summary: Stiles has had a shitty few days. He decides to go to Daeton and make a very important decision. entry.title: Stiles' Treasures
entry.summary:
Author: Ann_shawol24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,783Chapters: 12/26Kudos: 72

Summary: Allison is about to have her child, but her birth brings more complications than expected. The baby wants the pack together and won't be born until she has it.Desperate, Scott decides to search for the person who was once his best friend, Stiles Stilinski, who one day just left town.Can they convince him to come back?Enter and find out.Originally published on Wattpad, April 2020 - Completed May 2020This story is just a translation of the original Spanish version on Wattpad; it's been in the works for a while.Both the translation and the original work are my own.

entry.title: call it off
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,203Chapters: 9/11Kudos: 832

Summary: “You kissed me,” Stiles says. To that, Derek says nothing. His gaze does not leave Stiles’ mouth. “But you… you’re straight,” Stiles carries on. And still, Derek says nothing. His fingers twitch harshly around his grip on thin air. “You have a girlfriend,” Stiles whispers. Derek is on his feet in an instant.  Stiles is the gay, terminally-single loser of Beacon Hills High. Derek is the straight, cheerleader-dating jock he should have been smart enough to stay away from.

entry.title: you were raised by wolves and voices (every night, i hear them howling)
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,383Chapters: 1/30Kudos: 82

Summary: Derek tips his head towards the heavens, dragging a rough palm over his face. “So I'm on babysitting duty. You're putting me on babysitting duty.” “I'm eighteen,” Stiles mumbles, scowling and petulant. Derek doesn't even look at him. “The training of an emissary is integral to the pack bond,” Deaton retorts. “To many, it is sacred, the connection between Alpha and emissary. You should treat it as an honour, Alpha Hale.” “Yeah, I feel real honoured,” Derek deadpans, sarcasm dripping from his dulcet tone. Deaton simply shakes his head with a sigh. ______ In which, post-3B, Derek doesn't get captured and instead travels. Finding himself faced with an Alpha Pack allied with a Witches' Coven on the hunt for the True Alpha, he returns to Beacon Hills to warn Scott of the threat. He's tasked with overseeing the new emissary's training, which just so happens to be Stiles. It's a test of patience for the both of them.

  • this got angstier the more i wrote??
  • Slow Burn
  • Slow Build Derek Hale/Stiles Stilinski

entry.title: Just A Human
entry.summary:
Author: FanFiction36

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,834Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 510

Summary: (A current rewriting)Stiles had always been the type that needed physical contact. Hugs, cuddles, didn't matter. Then when the pack had revealed they all scented each other and he got a taste of werewolf pack family, he was addicted. But then everyone pulled away. He was pushed from the family he had come to love.Now that he was alone, Stiles is realizing just how much danger he had gotten himself into. How was he going to heal from the loss of a pack?Then it happened like a switch after an attack. The pack was back by his side like they never left. And he felt himself try to give in to it, but Stiles doesn't forgive so easily.
